2. other tab -  no sound
3. other window - no sound

comments.text:
Works for me on:
Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0b13pre) Gecko/20110314 Firefox/4.0b13pre

*Note: Is the sound on for Firefox for in the Windows volume mixer? It should be there as "Plugin Container for Firefox".
Can you reproduce the issue on a clean Firefox profile?
